nodes.text: The electromagnetic duster was a cleaning tool created from the template of the Vibro-mop, a type of mop invented in 3666 BBY. The electromagnetic duster, along with the ion-charged dishrag, were considered a part of a new and exciting array of cleaning apparatus derived from the Vibro-mop.

The electromagnetic duster was mentioned in the Codex entry "History of the Vibro-mop" in Knights of the Fallen Empire, the 2015 expansion to the 2011 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars: The Old Republic, developed by BioWare.
